appDescription.message: Get notified when your favorite Kick streamers go live with auto-launch capability.

duplicateTabGuardButtonTooltip.message: Toggle duplicate tab guard when auto-launching. When on, a new tab will not be opened if a tab for the stream is already open.

resetSuspendOnRestartCheckbox.message: Reset auto-launch settings to On when browser restarts

autoUnmuteCheckbox.message:
Automatically unmute player after auto-launch
(Note: Not visually reflected in the volume slider)

fetchError.message: Failed to load channels. Please check that you are logged in to Kick and try again.
